meanings.definition: Not aborted; allowed to continue or develop
meanings.sent1: The unaborted project grew into a successful business.
meanings.sent2: The unaborted flower bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The unaborted plan to have a picnic got rained out.
meanings.sent4: Her unaborted dream of becoming a doctor finally came true.
meanings.sent5: The unaborted friendship between the two neighbors lasted for decades.

meanings.definition: Remaining in existence without being terminated or cancelled
meanings.sent1: The unaborted contract ensured the services would continue.
meanings.sent2: The unaborted tradition of family dinners brought everyone together.
meanings.sent3: The unaborted movie marathon lasted until the early hours of the morning.
meanings.sent4: The unaborted memories of childhood lingered in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The unaborted enthusiasm for learning kept the students engaged.
